import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import { observer } from "mobx-react"; import "../Styles/SurveyForm.css"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import surveyStore from "../Mobx/SurveyStore"; const SurveyForm: React.FC = () => { const [Q1, setQ1] = useState({ QuestionID: 1, Answer: "Excellent", }); const [show, Setshow] = useState(false); // const [data, Setdata] = useState([]); const handleQ1 = (e: { target: { name: any; value: any } }) => { setQ1({ ...Q1, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; useEffect(() => { async function fetchData() { await surveyStore.GetQuestion(); } fetchData(); }, []); if (surveyStore.isLoading) { return <>; } const handleSubmit = async () => { await surveyStore.SubmitQ1(Q1); }; return (

Customer Satisfaction Survey

{surveyStore.Questions[0].Question_En}

{surveyStore.Questions[1].Question_En}

{surveyStore.Questions[2].Question_En}

{surveyStore.Questions[3].Question_En}

{show === true ? (
Mobile
) : ( <> )}
); }; export default observer(SurveyForm);
